welcome.smallerText:
I build responsive websites, easy to use JS libraries and also doing a bit of gamedev.

Look below at my work, and contact me. Feel free.

mywork.githubText: Some of these and other smaller projects you can find at my GitHub.

descriptions.portfolio: Simple one-page site to show what am I doing, also to leave some information about me in the internet. Project was build on React, to let the website have easy translations in polish/english language, also to make single project preview easier on it.
descriptions.pn-website: Website built using pure CSS and HTML to display how the library Page-NotificationsJS works, and also to place there the documentation.
descriptions.pn: Simple library for easy animated notifications on every website, using only VanillaJS and CSS. It supports 4 types of notifications, and they also can be turned into time-based and will dissapear after a given time.
descriptions.baslinkr: Mobile application build for the customer, using AndroidStudio with Java. It's all based on the API that BaseLinker provides, and can do all the work that the desktop version does.
descriptions.nul: Android puzzle game made with Godot and 2D graphic editors. It's filled with 60 hard levels, all wrapped in minimalistic graphics and sound effects. A lot of great feedback is left on the Google Play.
descriptions.stellar: Android puzzle game made with Godot and 2D graphic editors. The main purpose is to shoot the meteor right into the black hole, often using gravity tricks and colliding with several objects.
